Now, she is on her third loan application for the amount of PHP 14,000 for additional capital for fishing.  She makes use of torn foam in her fish vending and hopes to buy new ones. Through this project, she believes she can raise more income and be of help for the expansion of their business.  

Rochelyn has found comfort for her financial needs through Paglaum MPC, for which she is very thankful with all her heart.

loans.use: to purchase new foam for her fish business.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is 57 years old, married and has settled for a living in Camanga, Tukaran, Zamboanga del Sur. He has been operating his own rice farm for many years in order to make a living. He repaid successfully his previous loan used for weeding maintenance costs. 

Farming is their main source of income and he wants to have a greener farm. He took a new loan recently to purchase fertilizer and pay for planting costs. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the farm to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pay for planting costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to add more stock of both new and used clothes for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies to take care of her crops and animals, such as manure, an irrigation system, fertilizer, and fungicide.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a lot of palm nuts to make into palm oil

loans.name: Kalyani Mahila Samuha Group

texts.en:
Juhibala, a small business woman, age 22, is the leader of a group that hails from Satsang, Deoghar district, Jharkhand. Her family is comprised of her husband and a daughter. The member standing with a raised hand is Juhibala. 

Juhibala’s husband works in a private company. Juhibala sells imitation jewelry at her house itself as it helps her manage both the shop as well as take care of the family. She earns just 100 to 150 INR which is not at all sufficient to maintain her family. So she, along with 4 members of Kalyani Mahila Samuha group, is requesting a loan to improve their business. 

With the loan amount Juhibala will purchase a huge amount of artificial jewelry. She wishes to expand her business and make good profits. The other four members of her group are Manju, Lalita, Gita and Alika.

loans.use: to buy imitation jewelry.

loans.name: Gayatri Mahila Samuha Group

texts.en:
Usha, a small business woman, age 38, is the leader of a group that hails from Satsang, Deoghar district, Jharkhand. Her family is comprised of her husband and four children.

Usha’s husband is managing a small grocery shop and sells daily need items like rice, pulses, sugar, tea, flour, oil, potatoes, onions, garlic, and ginger, etc. Usha is engaged in a tailoring business, she stitches blouse, dresses etc. Their daily income is not sufficient to maintain her family. 

She along with 4 members from Gayatri Mahila Samuha group want to avail themselves of a loan to improve their business. Usha plans to purchase a huge amount of grocery items and some tailoring material. She wishes to have more customers and make good profits. The other four members of her group are Bobita, Rani, Kanchan and Hema.

loans.use: to buy tailoring material as well as grocery items.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy phones and accessories for her shop.

loans.name: Efrain Luis

texts.es:
El socio Efraín pertenece al banco comunal SAN VALENTIN, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio continua dedicándose a la artesanía, él socio es técnico restaurador, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia, él socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su trabajo el cual le trae satisfacciones personales.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de pinturas entre otros.
El socio se siente agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Efraín is part of the communal bank SAN VALENTIN.  The bank is located in the district of Cusco and department of Cusco.  

He continues working in crafts, and is a restoration specialist. He wants to be able to continue doing this work and support his family.  He has a good time performing his work, which brings him personal satisfaction.  

He is requesting the loan for the purchase of paint and other materials.  He is grateful for the loan and is committed to making his payments on him.

loans.use: to purchase paints and other materials for his work.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more goats to raise and sell.

loans.name: Stanley

texts.en:
Listening to Stanley referring to the different breeds of dairy cows on his compound, one would mistake him for an Agricultural Extension Officer. Stanley, from Kapsowar, a remote town in Kenya, is an active and progressive farmer of his locality. He has a wife and two children and together they live on a small piece of land. Traditionally, his primary source of income has been eggs, crops and personal business, and he has been practicing farming for the past 5 years. Having done farming for such a long time he has gained so much experience that he is always ranked the best farmer in his village. 

Kenyans drink a lot of milk. This tradition is probably derived from tribal culture - particularly the Maasai tribe (Stanley’s tribe) - where cows represent wealth. Demand for dairy milk has been high and Stanley wants to take advantage of the market. Therefore, he is seeking a loan to buy a quality dairy cow. Dairy farming is another profitable agricultural venture in Kenya and Stanley has already identified the breed of dairy cow that he wants. Stanley always says that, “to become a successful dairy farmer, one does not need to be a livestock expert. All one needs is passion, information, and keenness to learn from the successful farmers.” 

He has planted so many trees on his farm and dairy food will never be a problem. Marketing of the dairy milk and dairy products will not be a challenge because he will sell the milk directly to the market and also to big dairy processing firms. Through the loan, Stanley will not only benefit from milk but will also benefit from manure (cow dung) that will be used in improving the fertility of his farm thus saving money that would have been spent buying fertilizer. 

Stanley has been facing challenges in accessing finances but feels relieved knowing that institutions such as Juhudi Kilimo via Kiva are there to make his dream come true. Stanley chose Juhudi Kilimo because the interest rate on their loan is low and is on a reducing basis. Stanley underwent training through Juhudi Kilimo and during the training season, he learned that saving is a continuous process in many micro finance institutions. 

Through accumulated profits Stanley plans to permanently improve his living conditions and secure the future of his school-aged children by paying tuition fees for them. He plans that through increased income he will be able to buy more dairy cows and build a bio-gas digester and hence save costs incurred in buying fuel.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Michel Group

texts.fr:
Mr B. Michel est le représentant du groupe Michel. Il se porte très bien. Marié, il est père de 07 enfants, le plus âgé a 28 ans et le moins âgé a 11 ans. 03 vont à l’école. Il a 08 personnes en charge.
Monsieur est agriculteur depuis 40 ans. Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants. Ses clients sont les commerçants du marché de son quartier.
Il  veut s’acheter 5sacs d’engrais, 3boites de semence de choux et 2boites de semence d’oignon.
Mr B. Michel veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour renforcer son activité et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mr. B. Michel is the representative of Michel Group. He is doing very well, married, and is the father of seven children. The oldest child is 28 and the youngest 11 years old. Three of them go to school. He is supporting eight persons. 

He has been a farmer for 40 years. He buys his supplies in the nearby markets. His clients are the market sellers from his neighborhood. He wants to buy 5 sacks of fertilizer, three boxes of cabbage seed, and two boxes of onion seeds. 

Mr. B. Michel wants to use his profit to grow his activity and improve living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy 5 sacks of fertilizer, three boxes of cabbage seed, and two boxes of onion seeds.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy foodstuffs such as various sorts of oil, rice, and milk for resale in his shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and buy educational equipment for her oldest son.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is 51 years old and lives in Dicoloc, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 3 dependents who are now adults or of school age. 
 
Juliet is currently employed in one of the offices of the Local Government Unit of this town as an office clerk. She has been doing this for 34 years already and earns approximately PHP 15,000 each month doing this type of work. But sometimes her salary and husband’s income from hog-fattening is not enough to support their family needs and children’s education. 

She has requested a loan for the financial support for her son’s passport and visa processing, medical examination, seaman’s book and allowances for employment abroad as a new graduate in a nautical course.

Juliet has been a member of PMPC for 5 years. In the future, Juliet hopes that all her children will gain a degree from college.

loans.use: to pay for her son’s passport and visa processing, medical examination, seaman’s book and allowances.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan, age 50, is married with three children. Her husband is a driver from a small company and they live in the municipality of Plaridel. 

From her desire to help the family, she engaged in dried fish vending, starting up with a capital of 3,000 PHP. It has operated for two years already and it is doing well. Now, she is planning to borrow  PHP 10,000 from Paglaum MP Cooperative, of which she became a member in 2007. 

She wants to have a stall in the public market to display her dried fish. Someday she will be happy seeing her children finish their studies and became successful in their chosen field.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is a 47-year-old member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative from Baybay Panalsalan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental, industriously caring for her fishing activities. She is married and has 7 children. She personally takes charge of their business, and their children work to support them. The business is doing well. 

Delia has humbly taught her children the techniques of how to enjoy business and at the same time make earnings from it. The ups and downs of the business are nothing but a normal situation for her. Sometimes they have business losses, sometimes a good return. She is a patient and diligent business woman. 

Now Delia sees a good opportunity to expand their business. She is requesting PHP 5,000 from Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for capital to buy additional nets and fishing accessories. She deeply wishes for a good education for her kids and for them to have businesses on their own.

loans.use: to purchase additional nets and fishing accessories.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay tuition fees for her middle son.

loans.name: Santos Alfredo

texts.es:
Santos de 34 años de edad, es albañil y estudio hasta 9° grado, esta acompañado y es padre de 3 hijos de 4, 10 y 15 años, los 3 estudian en la escuela de la comunidad. Su pareja se dedica a atender 1 molino.

Santos se dedica a la albañilería desde hace 19 años y además de eso trabajaba en la elaboración de estructuras metálicas, trabajo que lo aprendió de su tío y hoy le agradece ya que gracias a eso a podido sacar a su familia adelante.

El crédito que solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para la compra de láminas y tubos de aluminio para construir una galera y así poder realizar el trabajo de estructuras metálicas en su casa y no mojarse en el tiempo de invierno.

Los sueños de Santos son que sus hijos se preparen en una carrera universitaria y así puedan defenderse en la vida con un buen empleo, también sueña con comprar un vehículo para poder transportarse fácilmente.
texts.en:
Santos is 34 years old, is a construction worker, and studied through ninth grade. He is married and is the father of three children who are 4, 10, and 15 years old. They study in the school in the community. His partner attends to a mill. 

Santos has been doing construction work for 19 years and has also been working on making metallic structures. This is work that he learned from his uncle, and today he is thankful for that since thanks to this, he has been able to take his family forward.

The loan requested from CrediCampo is to buy aluminum sheets and pipes to build a gallery and, thus, to be able to do his work on metallic structures in his home so that he won’t get soaked in the winter weather. 

Santos’s dreams are for his children to prepare for a university education and, thus, to be able to take care of themselves with good jobs. He also dreams of buying a car to be able to travel easily.

loans.use: to buy aluminum sheets and pipes to build a gallery.

loans.name: Roza

texts.ru: Роза, 42 года, замужем, трое детей, двое - школьники. У Розы среднее образование, она на протяжении многих лет занимается сельским хозяйством, начав этот бизнес почти с нуля. На сегодняшний день прибыль Розы составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. У нее в хозяйстве есть 2 дойные коровы, 1 теленок. Роза имеет неплохой доход от продажи молока местным жителям. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Роза обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита она планирует откладывать на обучение ее детей.
texts.en: Roza is 42 and married with three children, two of whom are in school. She has a high school education and has been working in agriculture for many years, a business she began practically from nothing. She now brings in around 10,000 KGS per month and currently has two milking cows and one calf, with decent revenue from selling milk to local residents. With the goal of further developing her business, Roza has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 70,000 KGS to purchase livestock. She plans to put profits from the loan toward her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to be more profitable and pay for her children's education

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
A 47-year-old married woman, Gloria earns a living through her sari-sari or variety store business. She lives with her husband and three children in Carles, Iloilo. Gloria is also engaged in a fishing business with her husband. 

Gloria wants to expand her store but she lacks capital to do so. For this reason, she asked for a loan from CEVI to to buy more stock for her store like canned goods, noodles, soda, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and seasonings among others and a new fishing net. Gloria believes that through a loan, she will be able to augment her stock thus allowing her to sell more to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her store and a new fishing net.

loans.name: Adela

texts.en:
Adela joined Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative in the year 2010 and she appreciates the programs, services and continuous education of the co-op. She is a member in good standing and very active in attending the various programs and services that the Cooperative offers. 

She is requesting a loan of an amount of PHP 3,000. This loan is intended to purchase additional stocks of tomatoes, ginger, garlic and onions to sell. This is only her means of earning a living when she became a widow. 

Adela dreams of nothing more than to have a happy, healthy life and an adequate income out of her small business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of tomatoes, ginger, garlic and onions to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his garden and buy more stock like sugar and omo to sell.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.en:
Oscar is 24 years of age, a hard worker and always says, “I eat from my sweat.” He is based in Kongyalil, a rural village in Kapsowar. He has no family, has been practicing farming for the past two years, and has never looked back. His primary source of income has been milk, eggs and crops. 

Most of the small holder farmers in Kongyalil village own approximately half an acre per household and this has made them work extra hard to fully utilize their farms. Oscar has been practicing mixed farming and he enjoys the income he gets, but he has been facing challenges delivering his products to the market. Kongyalil village is a very remote area and the roads are in pathetic condition; this has hampered Oscar from making timely delivery of products to the market while still fresh. Oscar sells vegetables, milk and tomatoes which are very perishable and require quick delivery if you are to fetch a high price. 

Oscar is seeking a loan to buy a motorbike that will help him deliver his products to the market in a timely way so he can overcome the challenge of facing losses. Through the loan he will deliver the products timely to the market and this means he will never suffer losses, which will translate into an immediate increase in profits. Oscar plans to employ someone who will help him on the farm and deliver products to his large client base. Profits from the loan will be used to comfortably repay the loan fully and invest in a solid foundation for his family to come.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike to deliver his products to the market.

loans.name: Aida

texts.ru: Аиде 40 лет, она замужем, мать 2 детей. Образование-среднее. Дети школьного возраста, помогают по хозяйству. С 2009 года Аида занимается сельским хозяйством - животноводством и полеводством. Также Аида с мужем построили баню и оказывают банные услуги населению. В хозяйстве Аиды есть 20 овец, 1 дойная корова, 5 телят, заготовлено 200 тюков сена. Также есть земельный участок, где Аида выращивает пшеницу, эспарцет и картофель. Аида ежедневно реализует около 5 литров молока. Прибыль позволила Аиде размножить скот в домашнем хозяйстве и тем самым улучшить семейное благосостояние. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку строительных материалов для постройки сарая для скота. Аида решила построить сарай, так как обещают холодную зиму, а скот содержать негде. Доходы от бизнеса Аида планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее увеличение количества скота, а также сделать ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Aida is 40 and married with two school-aged children who help around the home. She has a high school education and has been working in agriculture and animal husbandry since 2009. In addition, she and her husband built a banya (Russian-style sauna) for use by local residents. Aida currently has 20 sheep, one milking cow, five calves and 200 bales of prepared hay as well as a piece of land where she grows wheat, potatoes and hay. Aida sells about five litres of milk every day, and these profits have allowed her to breed her livestock and improve her family's well-being. 

With the goal of further developing her business, Anna has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 80,000 KGS to buy construction materials so she can build a barn for her livestock. She has decided to build a barn since this winter is supposed to be a cold one and she has nowhere to keep the animals. She plans to put profits from the loan into further increasing her number of livestock and into home repairs.

loans.use: to buy construction materials so she can build a barn for her livestock

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en:
Alfred is a 32-year-old male living with two children aged two and five. He lives in Masindi, Uganda and deals in a phone accessory business. 

He started the business to increase his family income on seeing that the demands of his family were too high to contain. He also set up a mobile money business to supplement his income. 

He is challenged by inadequate capital which means he can't expand his business though he dreams of opening up more mobile money outlets in the nearby towns. He needs a loan to buy phones to sell.

loans.use: to buy phones to sell.

loans.name: Amanecer De Los Inkas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “AMANECER DE LOS INKAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             

La socia es la Sra. Romania la socia tiene 51 años de edad tiene 01 hijo y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia vende arroz, azúcar, leche entre otros, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
 La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azúcar entre otros.
Las socias que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These group members belong to the communal bank "Dawn of the Incas".  This back is located in the district of Cusco, and belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Romania is a 51 year old group member who is married with one child. She alternates her daily activities with work in a grocery store.  She has been working in this business for a long time and things are going well thanks to her daily efforts.  She sells rice, sugar, and milk among other items.  In this way she is able to help her family get ahead. 

She needs a loan in order to buy rice, sugar and other items.

The group members who appear individually in the photo requested permission to arrive late to the meeting due to work obligations. 

Romania and her group thank everyone who forms part of making this dream possible and promise to comply with the repayment of their loans according to the established deadlines.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new fishing boat

loans.name: Teresa Del Jesús

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Sagrado Corazón se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta, ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Teresa, tiene 61 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen un hijo de  20 años de edad el cual tiene capacidades especiales y requiere de muchos cuidados. Su esposo trabaja en una empresa de la ciudad.
Doña Teresa es una mujer que le gusta trabajar y salir adelante, ella tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa,  allí vende todo tipo de productos, como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su esposo le ayuda en su trabajo cuando puede,  le gusta su trabajo ya que allí se gana lo suyo y está al tanto de los cuidados de su hijo. Tiene más de 20 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Grupo De Crédito  hace 12 años y le gusta porque ha hecho más amigas en el grupo. Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
The Sagrado Corazón loan group meets every 15 days in Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches, much visited year round, and for being a city whose beauty is without equal among other tourist attractions.

This is where Teresa lives.  She is 61 years old, married and from her marriage has a 20 year old son who has special needs and requires much care.  Her husband works for a company in the same city.

Teresa is a woman who loves to work and get ahead.  She runs a grocery store in her house, selling all kinds of products, such as rice, sugar, oil, detergents, legumes, vegetables and fruits.  She works every day from 6 AM until 8PM and sometimes later.  Her husband helps with the work when he can.  Teresa likes her work because she can earn for herself and be always attentive to her son's care.  She has been carrying out this work for more than 20 years, and it's going well for her.  

She will use this loan to provide more stock for her store.  Teresa will buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents,  cold meats and other basic needs.  She has been a member of the loan group for 12 years and likes it because of making many friends in the group.  Her goals are to continue with her business and that her store will grow daily.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents,  cold meats and other basic needs

loans.name: Lily

texts.en:
Mrs. Lily is a full-time multibusiness woman. She has been operating a boarding house in the city for five years already. At first, she had only five rooms for rent. And as the business improved over the years due to her diligent attitude, she has now ten rooms in operation. 

Mrs. Lily and her husband did not stop uplifting their lives so they put up a car wash. This car wash has operating for one year already. This kind of business really needs energy and power. So the purpose of this loan is to purchase a power generator to be able to provide continuous service to customers especially when there are power interruptions. 

She has five children some are already grown-up and some are of school-age so through this business, she can continuously support her family.

loans.use: to purchase a generator for her car wash business and boarding house.

loans.name: Necitas

texts.en:
Necitas is 66 years old and lives in Naga, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 3 dependents who are now of adult age. 
 
Necitas is a retired public school teacher. At present, she is engaged in dealing cosmetics and has been for 2 years already to add their family income because sometimes her monthly pension is not enough to meet their needs. She is earning an approximate amount of PHP 3,000 each month doing this type of business. She has requested a loan to be used to purchase construction materials, particularly boards and paints for house repairs and renovations.

Necitas has been a member of PMPC a year ago. In the future, Necitas hopes to expand her cosmetics dealing business.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials particularly boards and paints.

loans.name: Zyra

texts.en:
Zyra is a married mother of two; she is requesting this loan to pay for her husband’s (Nexhip) heart surgery. A loan of an amount of 150,000 Albanian Lek will help Nexhip go ahead with the procedure; he has been scheduled to have an immediate surgical procedure. They are together in the photograph. 

Even though Nexhip’s health hasn’t been well all these past years, he still has managed to work in a quarry. Here it is what he said sighing at the same time: “I had no other choice but to work and feed the family. There have been so many times where I had no strength at all to do even light work, let alone physical one as I have done, but...” 

Their family lives in the city of Korce.

loans.use: to pay for a surgical procedure on the heart for her husband.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase educational materials and a new bicycle for her son

loans.name: May

texts.en:
May is 22 years old from Maria Aurora, Aurora. She is taking up Consumer Electronics at St. John Bosco Faith Academy. 

She wants to finish her schooling to have a personal progress or growth, to achieve her goals and to support her parents financially. To make this possible, May wants to avail herself of an educational loan of PHP 15,000 from the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to pay for her tuition fees.

loans.name: Flor María

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Sagrado Corazón se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Flor, tiene 64 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen seis hijos mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven en su casa. Su esposo es electricista. Hace varios años ella aprendió corte y confección en una academia en la ciudad.
Doña Flor con la finalidad de obtener sus propios ingresos y con estos ayudar con los gastos del hogar y la educación de sus hijos desde hace 40 años  instalo  en su casa un pequeño taller de costura, allí se dedica a confeccionar todo tipo de ropa, tiene contrato con varias empresas en la ciudad a quienes les confecciona los uniformes, ella también elabora ropa de todo tipo a personas particulares que le piden sus obras ya que la calidad de sus trabajos es muy buena y sus clientes la prefieren por esto. 
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar telas y otros materiales para la costura. Lleva más de 10 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le son de mucha ayuda. Sus sueños son tener un taller más grande.
texts.en:
The communal banking group "Sacred Heart" meets every two weeks in the city of Manta, a locale known for its beautiful beaches which are very popular at all times of year, as well as for being a city of unequal beauty with many tourist destinations.

Flor lives in this town.  She is 64 years old, is married, and has six children who are grown, but two of whom still live with her.  Her husband is an electrician.  Many years ago Flor learned to sew and the trades of a seamstress in an academy in her city. Her goal was to obtain her own income and assist with the household expenses and the education of her children.  For that reason she installed a small sewing shop in her home.  She works there making all kinds of clothing.  She has contracts with various businesses in the city and makes uniforms.  She also makes clothing for individuals who ask for items since her products are of very good quality and her customers prefer her for that reason.  

She is asking for a loan in order to buy fabric and other materials for sewing.  She has been working with Kiva's local partner and her communal banking group for ten years and she likes the loans because they help her a lot.  Her dream is to have a larger shop.

loans.use: To purchase fabric and other items for sewing.

loans.name: Las Rosas Group

texts.es:
El grupo "Las Rosas" se encuentra ubicado en una comunidad muy tranquila, las personas de dicho lugar son muy trabajadoras y la mayoría tiene algún negocio establecido en su casa, mientras que algunos más salen a vender a otras poblaciones. Además, el lugar se caracteriza por el cultivo de nopales, desde la entrada se pueden apreciar los enormes invernaderos de nopales.  

La hermana de Pascual, uno de los integrantes actuales, eligió el nombre del grupo a raíz de su gusto por las flores. Actualmente el grupo está conformado por cinco personas. 

Rosa quien pertenece al grupo tiene 28 años y vive en unión libre con Abel. Desde hace cuatro años han formado una familia con sus gemelos quienes aún no asisten a la escuela. Rosa se dedica a la cría y engorda de becerros desde hace dos años. Cuenta que es un negocio muy fácil "pero sobretodo me encanta porque así puedo estar con mis niños y al mismo tiempo ayudo con los gastos del hogar". Rosa necesita de su préstamo para comprar más alimento, sacate molido y maíz para los animales que tiene en su casa. Todos los días, desde las 5 am Rosa se levanta para iniciar sus actividades: tarda aproximadamente una hora para alimentar a 3 bueyes. Ella sabe que debe cuidar muy bien a sus animales, mientras más grandes y nutridos estén, las ganancias pueden ser aun mejor. Su esposo fue quien inició la actividad, él los atendía, pero después le ofrecieron un trabajo en su comunidad y decidieron que ella continuaría con el cuidado de los animales. A Rosa le encantaría tener más animales pues para ella representa una gran ventaja vender fácilmente algún animal ante alguna situación imprevista, especialmente en casos de salud relacionados con sus hijos que es lo que más le preocupa a Rosa. 

Los demás integrantes del grupo son Eleuteria quien invertirá en joyería de plata y chapa de oro, Modesto y Magdaleno, en frutas y verduras y Pascual, en fantasía y novedades . La foto fue tomada en el jardín del municipio de San Felipe del Progreso, Rosa viste un abrigo rojo.
texts.en:
“Las Rosas” (The Roses) group is from a very peaceful community. The people from this place are very hard working; the majority of the people run a business from their homes, while some others go to sell in other areas. Also, the place is characterized by the harvest of prickly pears, since from the beginning they were able to take advantage of the large greenhouses of prickly pears. The sister of Pascual, one of the current members, chose the name of the group because she likes the flowers. At present, the group includes five people.

Rosa, who belongs to the group, is 28 years old and lives in a common-law marriage with Abel. For four years, they have been a family with their twins, who still don’t attend school. Rosa has been raising and fattening calves for two years. She says that this business is very easy, but that above all she loves it because she it allows her to be with her children and, at the same time, to help with the household expenses. 

Rosa needs a loan to buy more food, ground grass, and corn for the animals she has in her home. Everyday, starting at 5am, Rosa wakes up to begin her work. It takes about one hour to feed the three oxen. She knows that she should care for her animals very well, since the larger and healthier they are, the better her earnings will be. Her husband was the one that started the activity. He was taking care of the animals, but after he was offered a job in their community, they decided that she would continue raising the animals. Rosa loves having more animals, since it is an advantage for her to sell an animal before some unexpected event, especially in cases related to her children’s health, which worries Rosa most. 

The other members of the group are Eleuteria, who will invest in silver jewelry and gold sheets; Modesto and Magdaleno, who will invest in fruits and vegetables; and Pascual, who will invest in imitation and novelty items. The photo was taken in the garden in the municipality of San Felipe del Progreso. Rosa is in the red coat.

loans.use: to buy food, ground grass, and corn for her animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Gideon

texts.en:
Gideon is a 32-year-old hardworking man living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is in a taxi transport business and selling produce. 

He started his business with hopes of earning a living. He faces challenges of high competition. However, he dreams of having enough income to look after his family. Gideon has asked for a loan to buy tires for his vehicle.

loans.use: to buy tires for his vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more goats in order to raise and sell them in the local markets to get a lot of money.

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
Anthony is 24 years old and is from Maria Aurora, Aurora. He is taking up Consumer Electronics at St. John Bosco Faith Academy. He wants to finish his studies to help his siblings and parents. 

Though it is hard to be away from his family while studying, he will endure that because he knows that it is for a better future. To help him sustain his schooling, he wants to avail an educational loan of PHP 15,000 from the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase school materials for her youngest daughter.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 43 years old, married and has three children. She manages a store selling grocery items to the people in their village. She has been in her business for ten years. She is not getting a fast growth in income, that is why she wanted to keep selling more merchandise. 

Mary Jane is now asking for a loan of PHP 6,000 to buy soft drinks, noodles, sardines and biscuits to sell. This will maintain good sales from her store. In the future, she hopes to continue offering good products and friendly services as well.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, noodles, sardines and biscuits to sell.

loans.name: Blanca Helena

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito La Pradera se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Blanca, tiene 51 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive con ella. El marido es jubilado.
Doña Blanca es una mujer que le gusta trabajar y prepararse día a día para salir adelante y con esto pues darles lo mejor a su familia, ella realiza trabajos con medicina natural, tiene muchos clientes que siempre le piden sus sesiones y le compran  sus productos ya que estos son muy buenos y no tan caros como la medicina tradicional,   trabaja con mas de tres laboratorios de este tipo de medicinas las cuales le han dado muchos beneficios en estos tres años que lleva en este negocio.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar medicinas naturistas. Lleva tres años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos ella financia su negocio. Sus sueños es seguir aprendiendo y mejorando su negocio.
texts.en:
La Pradera (The Meadow) loan group meets every 15 days in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches, which are visited by many people in any season of the year, and for being a city with unparalleled beauty with many tourist attractions. 

Blance lives there. She is 51 years old and is in a common-law marriage, from which she has two adult children, one of whom still lives with her. Her husband is retired.

Blanca is a woman who likes to work, and she prepares day after day to go forward and to give the best to her family. She does work with natural medicine. She has many clients who always ask her for sessions and buy products from her since the products are very good and are not as expensive as traditional medicine. She works with more than three laboratories of this type of medicine, which have given her many benefits in her three years in this business.

The loan will be used to buy natural medicines. She has spent three years as part of the loan group, and she likes it because with the loans, she has financed her business. Her dreams are to continue learning and improving her business.

loans.use: to buy natural medicines.

loans.name: Nelda Alicia

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Sagrado Corazón se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Nelda, tiene 74 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo es taxista. Hace varios años ella aprendió corte y confección en una academia en la ciudad.
Doña Nelda con la finalidad de obtener sus propios ingresos y con estos ayudar con los gastos del hogar y aprovechando los conocimientos en corte y confección instalo   en su casa un pequeño taller de costura, allí se dedica a confeccionar todo tipo de ropa a personas particulares, en ocasiones elabora uniformes para ciertas instituciones educativas de la ciudad, en estos días le ayuda una persona ya que el trabajo aumenta pero la mayor parte del tiempo trabaja sola, ya son más de 40 años dedicada a esta profesión con la cual salen adelante.
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar telas y otros materiales para la costura. Esta desde el segundo ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan  los créditos.
texts.en:
The "Sagrado Corazón" communal bank meets every fortnight in the city of Manta. This city is known for it's beautiful beaches that are visited at all seasons of the year and as a city of unequaled beauty boasting many touristic attractions.

Nelda lives here. She is 74 years old, married and has two grown, independent children from this relationship. Her husband is a taxi driver. A number of years ago she learned how to cut and sew in an academy in the city. With the aim of having her own income and with this be able to help with the household expenses and to take advantage of her knowledge of sewing Nelda opened a small sewing workshop in her house.

Here she works at sewing all types of clothing for individuals. Sometimes she makes uniforms for certain educational institutions in the city. These days she has a person helping her as her work is increasing. But most of the time she works alone. She has more than 40 years working in this profession to her advantage.

She will use this new loan to buy fabric and other materials for her sewing. She has been a member of the communal bank since it's second loan and she likes it because of the loans she gets.

loans.use: to buy fabric and other materials for sewing.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es:
Arturo es de la ciudad de San Pedro, está estudiando la carrera de ciencias de la salud, específicamente radiología.
Por medio de su trabajo quiere poder ayudar a las personas que necesitan atención en su salud. Es una persona que quiere ser alguien en la vida y ayudar a los demás.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de su matrícula y cuotas de la universidad.
texts.en:
Arturo is from the city of San Pedro and he is a student of Health sciences, specifically radiology.
Through his work he wants to be able to help people who need medical attention. He wants to be someone in life and to help others.

He is requesting this loan to invest in paying his tuition and university fees.

loans.use: to pay tuition and university fees.

loans.name: Restituta

texts.en:
Restituta is a responsible woman and manages a panciteria (noodle restaurant) business very well. She is 33 years old and married. She earns income by selling pancit (noodles topped with vegetables and meat). She has determination to succeed; that is why she needs additional revolving capital to invest in her business.

Restituta is now asking for a loan of PHP 6,000 to buy pancit, vegetables, eggs and ingredients used in cooking pancit. This will ensure a delicious food to sell. She will save additional revenue for education purposes.

loans.use: to buy pancit, vegetables, eggs and ingredients used in cooking pancit

loans.name: María Julia

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Sagrado Corazón se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 59 años de edad, hace varios años su esposos falleció pero  de esta relación tuvo 5 hijos mayores de edad, tres de ellos aun vive con ella. 
Doña María es una mujer muy trabajadora  que para lograr sus propios recursos y con estos salir adelante se dedica al comercio, ella tiene un puesto afuera de la universidad local, allí vende aguas, jugos, energizantes, gaseosas, y varios bocaditos de picar y golosinas, de esta forma ella logra ganarse la vida y más después de la muerte de su marido quien era el sustento del hogar. Lleva más de 7 años con esta actividad con la cual sale adelante.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar colas, jugos, aguas, golosinas entre otras cosas que vende. Lleva más de 15 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre ha recibido para salir adelante. Sus sueños son tener un gran local.
texts.en:
The communal banking group "Sacred Heart" meets every two weeks in the city of Manta, which is known for its beautiful beaches that are very popular year round, as well as for its unequaled beauty and many tourist attractions.

María lives in this town.  She is 59 years old and her husband died several years ago.  They had five children, who are all adults, but three of them still live with María.

María is a very hard-working woman who dedicates herself to business in order to get ahead.  She has a stall outside of the city and she sells fruit juices, flavored waters, energy drinks, sodas, and various sandwiches and items for snacking as well as candies.  In this way she has been able to earn a living since the death of her husband, who was the breadwinner. She has been working in this field for more than seven years and it helps her get ahead.  This loan will be used to buy juices, flavored waters, candies and other items to sale.  She has been with her communal bank for more than 15 years and she likes the help that she has always received to get ahead.  Her dream is to own her own shop.

loans.use: To buy juices, flavored waters, candies, etc.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
Gustavo trabaja para poder solventar los gastos de sus estudios, pero no le alcanza y recibe ayuda de sus padres.
Está en el segundo año de la carrera de técnico instrumentista, con lo que quiere poder ayudar a los profesionales por medio de su conocimiento.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus cuotas y matricula de la universidad, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Gustavo works to pay his school expenses, but it isn't enough, and he gets help from his parents.

He is in his second year of his machine technician degree, with which he wants to be able to help professionals through his knowledge.

He asks for this loan to be able to pay his university fees and tuition, so as to be able to continue with his education.

loans.use: to pay university fees and tuition.

loans.name: Yessenia Mireya

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Sagrado Corazón se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Yessenia, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 10, 9 y 2 años, los dos mayores estudian en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una empresa en la ciudad.
Doña Yessenia es una ama de casa que para obtener ingresos propios y con esto ayudarle a su marido con los con los gastos del hogar se dedica  a la venta de ropa, zapatos, productos de catalogo (perfumes, cremas, bisutería, etc.) ella también vende sabanas, edredones, entre otras cosas, siempre vende los productos que estén de temporada ya que así vende más rápido y sus ganancias siempre son  muy buenas, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su casa donde sus clientes llegan cuando necesitan algún producto, deja a crédito y cobra cada semana, lleva más de 12 años dedicada a esta actividad la cual empezó con uno de los créditos que recibió del grupo.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, zapatos, perfumes, cremas, bisuterías, sabanas y todo lo que ella vende. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace 12 años y le gusta porque con el primer crédito empezó su negocio. Sus sueños es darles lo mejor a sus hijos y su  familia.
texts.en:
The loan group Sagrado Corazón (Sacred Heart) meets every two weeks in the city of Manta, a city known for its beautiful beaches, which are much visited at every season of the year, and for being a city with unequaled beauty  and many tourist attractions.

Señora Yessenia lives is this place. She is 40 years old. She is married, and from this relationship she has three children, ages 10, 9, and 2. The two older ones are in school. Her husband works in a business in the city.

Doña Yessenia is a housewife who, in order to obtain her own income and with this help her husband with the household expenses, sells clothing, shoes, and catalog products (perfumes, creams, jewelry, etc.). She also sells sheets and comforters, among other items. She always sells the products that are in season, since this way she sells more quickly and her earnings are always good. Her form of selling is door to door, and she also sells in her house, where her customers come when they need some product. She leaves her products on credit and collects every week. She has been in this business for more than 12 years, and she began it with one of the loans that the group received.

This loan is to buy clothing, shoes, perfumes, creams, jewelry, sheets, and everything that she sells. She has been in the loan group for 12 years, and she likes it because with the first loan she began her business. Her dreams are to give the best to her children and her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, perfumes, creams, jewelry, sheets, etc., to sell

loans.name: Liza

texts.es:
Liza es de la ciudad de San Pedro, ella trabaja y estudia a la vez, trabaja en un banco y la carrera que está siguiendo es la de contabilidad.
Ella quiere ser una profesional exitosa que pueda ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos por medio de sus estudios.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en comprar una notebook, pagar su matrícula y algunos gastos de estudios que le será de mucha ayuda y podrá seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Liza is from the city of San Pedro. She works and studies at the same time. She works in a bank and her major is accounting.

She wants to be a successful professional who can help her family and her loved ones by means of her education.

She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in purchasing a laptop, and paying her tuition and some school expenses that will be very helpful to her and she will be able to continue with her education.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop, and pay university tuition and fees.

loans.name: Vladimir

texts.en:
Vladimir is a 55-year-old married man and the father of two children, 19 and 14 years old; they all live in the city of Korce, in the southeastern part of Albania. He is requesting from Kiva lenders a loan of 250,000 ALL to send his son, Jonel, to a public university. Jonel is going to study Economics; he’s been photographed next to his father.

Kindly note that the majority of youngsters here in Albania study Economics because they think that they will have more opportunities to find a job with this degree. Only a few young people consider studying professions/trades in the construction field. In recent years, fewer and fewer young man have been doing any types of trades.

While Vladimir works for pay, his wife works as a maid for a family not far from where they live (looking after the elders, cleaning up and cooking).

loans.use: to pay for his son's university fees

loans.name: Yenny

texts.es:
Yenny es de la ciudad de Caaguazú, es estudiante de la carrera de contabilidad, quiere ser una excelente profesional para poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos por medio de sus estudios.
La meta que tiene Yenny es ser un profesional útil, no solo a sí misma, sino también a la sociedad. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su universidad, de manera a poder seguir con sus metas.
texts.en:
Yenny is from the city of Caaguazú, and is an accounting student. She wants to be an excellent professional to be able to help her family and her loved ones by means of her education.

The goal that Yenny has is to be a useful professional, not only to herself, but also to society. She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in the university fees, and in this way be able to continue with her education.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
Sara es estudiante de la carrera de Ingeniería Agrónoma, ella vive con sus padres en la ciudad de San Lorenzo, aún no está trabajando, pero su anhelo es trabajar en la plantación y comercialización de productos hortícolas para poder ayudarle económicamente a sus padres y así sentirse útil, no solo a su familia, sino también a la sociedad.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de su tesis, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir con sus estudios, de manera a ser un profesional de bien.
texts.en: Sara is a student studying agricultural engineering. She lives with her parents in the city of San Lorenzo. She isn't working yet, but her desire is to work growing and selling horticultural products to be able to help her parents economically and also to feel useful, not only to her family but also to the society. She asks for this loan to be able to invest it in paying the costs of her thesis, since in this way she will be able to continue with her studies and, in turn, be a respectable professional.

loans.use: to pay her thesis expenses.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia tiene 30 años, ella vive con su marido y tiene dos hijos, por quienes están luchando para darle una vida digna y sin privaciones. Su marido trabaja en la Docencia es profesor de Educación Física. Actualmente Sonia está cursando el último año de la carrera de Contabilidad, tiene como Objetivo llegar a culminar de buena manera sus estudios y poder ser una profesional útil a la sociedad.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación, ya que de esa forma podrá cubrir ese gasto que tiene.
texts.en:
Sonia is 30 years old, lives with her husband and has two children, for whom she is fighting to give them a dignified live without deprivations. Her husband works in education and is a physical education teacher. Currently, Sonia is in her last year of her accounting degree and has a goal to finish her studies in good standing and to be a useful professional in society.

She asks for this loan to be able to pay the costs of the degree, since in this way she will be able to cover this expense she has.

loans.use: to pay her thesis expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa quiere ser una enfermera eficiente y quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas por medio de sus estudios y su conocimiento, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso para poder cubrir las cuotas de su universidad, lo que le fue de mucha ayuda.
Hoy pide este nuevo préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus gastos de titulación, ya que quiere poder cubrir el gasto que implica poder cubrir los gastos de su titulo. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que esta recibiendo y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en: Rosa wants to be an wants to be an efficient nurse and to help others using her education and knowledge. She used her previous loan to pay for cover her university fees, which was a big help. She is currently requesting a new loan to cover her degree expenses, as it comes with costs she needs to pay. She is grateful for this new new opportunity she is receiving, as it will be very helpful.

loans.use: to pay expenses for her nursing degree.

loans.name: Ryan

texts.en:
Ryan is 29 years old from Matag-ob, Leyte. He is married with a 5-year-old son. For three years now, he has been operating a Sari-sari (variety) store and a billiard pool table business. He is asking for a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy canned goods and beverages for his store. It is his hope that with a better capital, he can earn more from his business, and will be able to provide better for his family. 

In the future, he hopes to expand his business and to make it more successful for his son's needs, like education.

loans.use: to buy canned goods and beverages for his store.

loans.name: Evelyne

texts.en: Evelyne lives in Masindi, Uganda. She is married and charged with a responsibility of taking care of four children. She has a retail shop that sells general merchandise like soap, sugar, and salt. Evelyne is faced with a challenge of price fluctuations, though she dreams to educate her children to university. She needs another loan to buy general merchandise like soap, sugar, and salt.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise like soap, sugar, and salt.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge es padre de familia, a la vez estudia, y también trabaja como funcionario público, sigue sus estudios para poder progresar y salir adelante en la vida y poder dar a sus hijos una vida digna.
Jorge está estudiando para poder ser un abogado exitoso y poder ayudar a las personas que necesitan de su ayuda y sus servicios.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios, y luchar por sus metas.
texts.en:
Jorge is a father and, at the same time, a student. He also works as a public official; he continues his education to be able to progress and get ahead in life and be able to give his children a dignified life.

He is studying to be able to be a successful lawyer and be able to help people who need his help and his services.

He is asking for this loan to be able to invest it in paying his fees, and in this way to be able to continue with his education and fight for his goals.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro es de la ciudad de Ybycuí, es un joven que aspira a ser en un futuro, un buen contador que ayude a las demás personas por medio de sus estudios.
Cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres, ya que siempre están con él para poder apoyarle en todo lo que necesita.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Pedro is from the city of Ybycuí, and is a young man who aspires to, in the future, be a good accountant who helps other people by means of his education.

He has his parents' support, since they are always with him to be able to support him in whatever he needs.

He asks for this loan to be able to pay the costs of his studies, and in this way be able to continue with his education. He is grateful for the opportunity that he is getting to continue his education.

loans.use: pay university fees.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
Angela está tratando de salir adelante, es una joven de familia sencilla, con el apoyo de su hermana ha podido lograr lo que se propone y siempre está con ella.
Está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería Agroindustrial, y a través de el podrá realizar su sueño de ser una profesional exitosa, que ayude a las demás personas.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, de manera a poder seguir su meta de ser una buena profesional.
texts.en:
Angela is trying to get ahead. She is a young woman from a  simple family and, with the support of her sister, has managed to achieve what she sets out to do and is always with her. She is studying agribusiness engineering, and through this, she will be able to realize her dream which is to be a successful professional who helps others. 

 She asks for this loan to be able to pay her university fees, and in this way be able to continue with her goal of being a good professional.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Ramonita

texts.es:
Ramonita es una mujer que quiere salir adelante, por medio de sus estudios y el esfuerzo arduo que viene haciendo, es que esta cumpliendo con su meta de ser alguien en la vida, comenta que quiere ser una psicóloga y con lo cual podrá ser alguien en la vida.
Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en sus gastos de transporte y también en la compra de materiales. Hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para poder cubrir las cuotas de su universidad, y de esa manera poder seguir con su meta de ser alguien en la vida.
texts.en:
Ramonita is a woman who wants to get ahead through her studies and the arduous effort that she is making.  She is reaching her goal of being someone in life.  She says that she wants to be a psychologist, and that way she will be able to be someone in life.

She says that she used the previous loan for her transportation expenses and to buy materials.  She is now requesting a new loan to be able to cover her university payments.  This way she will be able to continue with her goal of being someone in life.

loans.use: to cover her university expenses.

loans.name: Haide

texts.en:
Haide is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her, as she was able to purchase merchandise items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household, and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 12,000 PHP to buy more merchandise items and products to increase her product inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Haide hopes that her business will continue to operate and she wants her family to be always healthy and happy. She meets every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to buy ready-to-wear products to sell.

loans.name: Segundo Pedro

texts.es: Pedro tiene 71 años de edad, es casado y tiene 8 hijos, mismos de los que 6 aun viven con él y de ellos 2 son los que están estudiando, Pedro  se dedica 20 años a la ganadería y a la agricultura, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca, para tenerla en un terrenito que ya tiene otra vaca, dice que este negocio es bueno ya que el ingreso es de la leche de sus vacas, su le ayuda en su negocio, lo que aspira de este negocio es que sus ingresos mejoren  y terminar de dar el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en: Pedro is 71 years old, and married with 8 children, 6 of whom live with him, and 2 of whom are in school. Pedro has worked for 20 years farming and raising livestock. He is requesting a loan to purchase a cow, to keep it on a piece of land where he already keeps his other cow. He says that his business is doing well, and he makes an income through his cows' milk. Another cow will help with his business. His goals are to increase his income and to provide an education for all of his children.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra proviene de una familia muy sacrificada, ella quiere llegar a ser una buena profesional, es por eso que está estudiando. Está estudiando la especialización de didáctica superior universitaria.
Ella quiere ser una buena docente, y así poder inculcar el amor a los estudios a sus futuros alumnos para poder ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir las cuotas de su universidad, de manera a poder seguir luchando por ser una profesional exitosa.
texts.en:
Sandra comes from a very self-sacrificing family. She wants to become a good professional and for this reason is going to school. She is studying the specialty of teaching practice.

She wants to be a good teacher, and in this way cultivate the love of learning in her future students to be able to be someone in their life.

She asks for this loan to be able to cover the university fees, and in this way to be able to continue her struggle to be a successful professional.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Salina

texts.en:
Hello, lenders! Meet Salina, 49 years of age and a very hardworking and self-driven farmer who is based in Kiptere, a remote village in Kericho. This region has harsh weather patterns, and poultry farming is the only profitable business venture. 

Salina is happily married and blessed with eight children. For the past 23 years, she has been involved in mixed farming, and her primary source of income has been selling milk and crop farming. She passionately loves poultry farming. When asked what is most enjoyable about farming, her reply was “selling eggs.” 

Her biggest challenge is the lack of funds to increase her poultry farming. She is seeking a loan to buy additional poultry. Poultry farming is the only business that thrives in the Kericho area because of the harsh weather patterns, so she wants to take full advantage of the poultry business. Salina is a member of Tembwet digital self-help group, and through the group, she has received training on financial management and saving. 

Through the loan, she will sell eggs to the local market and to her neighbors, hence improving her living conditions and getting out of the poverty situation she is in currently. Profits from the loan will be used in repaying the loan and increasing her business.

loans.use: to buy additional poultry.

loans.name: Pablo Fernando

texts.es: Pablo se caracteriza por ser un joven trabajador, el vive en el campo con sus padres quienes se dedican a la agricultura y a la ganadería y es de aquí que Pablo aprendió  a cultivar y a su criar su ganado, Pablo también se dedica a trabajar de chofer de un carro los días que le contratan o sea no es trabajo fijo, Pablo necesita el crédito para comprar una vaca y seguir incrementando su negocio,  lo que Pablo aspira es  seguir trabajando y de los ingresos que le deja su negocio poder comprarse un terrenito para mantener ahí a su ganado.
texts.en: Pablo is characterized as a hard-working young man. He lives in the countryside with his parents who work in agriculture and animal husbandry. It is from here that Pablo learned how to cultivate crops and to raise his cattle. Pablo also works as a driver on the days he is contracted, so it is not a steady job. Pablo needs the loan to purchase a cow to continue increasing his business. Pablo aspires to continue working and from the income generated by his business, be able to purchase a small plot to keep his cattle there.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.pt:
A senhora Angelina é cozinheira tem 47 anos de idade , mae casada de 5 filhos dos quais 3 estudam no ensino secundario outros 2 menores de idade, 1 a no nivel superior vive na casa própria 
Com o valor do empréstimo ira comprar chapa de zinco  portas varoes,  areia cimento, para dar continuidade a sua obra.
Projecto para o futuro diz que quer terminar sua obra para dar um lar melhor a sua familia e construir uma barraca para reforcar a renda familiar.
Diz que seus desafios sao  financeiros e para minimizar ira solicitar mais empréstimos para suprir as dificuldades e alcancar o seu sonho.
texts.en:
Angelina is a cook. She's 47 years old and a married mother of five children. Three of her children attend secondary school, two are below school age and one is in college. She lives in a house that she owns.
With the amount of the loan she'll purchase zinc plates, doors, rods, sand and cement so she can continue the construction work.
She states that her project for the future is to finish the construction work so that she can provide her family with a decent home. She also plans on building a sales booth in order to improve her family's income.
She states that her challenges are her finances. In order to minimize them, she'll apply for more loans so she can overcome hardships and achieve her dream.

loans.use: to purchase zinc plates, doors, rods, sand, and cement.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for school tuition and to purchase educational equipment for her oldest child

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase zinc plates, two doors, rods, sand, and cement.

loans.name: Rossana

texts.es:
La socia es la señora Rossana, la socia continua dedicándose a su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de arroz, azúcar entre otros.
La socia Rossana está muy agradecida con la ayuda de KIVA, para fortalecer su actividad económica.
 La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú.
texts.en:
This is Sra. Rossana. She continues to manage her grocery business. Rossana has been in this business for a long time and is doing very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work each day. She wants to keep working so that she can continue supporting her family.

Rossana is requesting a loan in order to buy rice, sugar, and other products. She is extremely grateful to have Kiva’s help so that she can strengthen her business. Rossana is a member of the Communal Bank “Kanchary” which is located in the city of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and other products.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es:
Ruben es un hombre de 25 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene un hijo de un año y su negocio es la producción de queso artesanal.
Él es emprendedor, luchador, buen padre, trabajador, responsable y optimista. Su negocio lo realiza en la comunidad de ‘Batallas’ que se encuentra ubicado en cercanías del lago sagrado Titicaca.
Ruben es de tez morena, cabello corto, negro, estatura mediana, su lengua materna es el aymara y utiliza el español para el comercio. Sus deseos de superación lo llevan a emprender varios negocios como es la producción de queso y el transporte libre como taxi. Él se encarga de transportar pasajeros en su taxi propio por comunidades y lugares turísticos cercanos al lago, y su otro negocio es la producción de queso artesanal en su domicilio donde su pareja colabora en gran parte. Su sueño es contar con más ganado lechero para producir más cantidad de leche e incrementar su producción quesera.
Es por esos motivos que Ruben solicita un préstamo para la compra de ganado lechero y con los beneficios darle un futuro mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Ruben is a 25-year-old man. He lives with his partner, has a 1-year-old son, and his business is making artisan cheese. 

He is an entrepreneur, persistent, a good father, hard-working, responsible and optimistic. He carries out his business in the community of "Batallas" which is located near the sacred lake of Titicaca. 

Ruben is tanned, with short black hair, and of average height.  His first language is Aymara and he uses Spanish for business. His desire to improve himself leads him to undertake various businesses such as cheese production and providing transportation as a taxi driver. He is in charge of transporting passengers in his own taxi in the community and to tourist destinations near the lake, and his other business is making artisan cheese in his home, where his partner helps a lot.  His dream is to have more dairy cows to make a greater quantity of milk, and increase his cheese production.

For these reasons, Ruben asks for a loan to purchase a dairy cow and with the profits, give his family a better future.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow and with the profits, give his family a better future.

loans.name: Benita Agripina

texts.es:
La socia Benita Agripina se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas y tambien se sigue dedicando al negocio de manualidades, la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias y mercados, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 4 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los animales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Benita Agripina continues to dedicate herself to running her business raising small animals, such as guinea pigs and hens. She also continues to run her craftwork business.

She raises the animals and fattens them, then she sells them at different fairs and markets. She works from 8:00am to 6:00pm. She's been running her business for 4 years and it's going very well. Her dream is to have a locale where she can sell her animals. She is requesting a loan to buy guinea pigs and hens.

This member is happy to receive a loan and promises to pay her installments.

loans.use: buy guinea pigs and hens.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
El socio Hector se dedica al negocio de artesania, el socio vende  tejidos, chompas, mantas y telares, el socio vende diferentes tejidos, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de venta de tejidos y telares. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar tejidos, chompas y telares.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Hector works in an artisan craft business. He sells knit products, sweaters, traditional woven blankets and other woven products. He sells various knit products and works from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm. He has had this business for 8 years and it is going very well. He dreams of expanding his business selling knit and woven products. He asks for a loan to purchase knit products, sweaters, and woven fabric.

He is happy for the loan and commits to making the loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase knit products, sweaters, and traditional woven fabric.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for raw materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.ru: София, 44 года, замужем, есть 2 сына. У Софии - средне-специальное образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она с 2008 года занимается изготовлением пельменей и выпечкой хлеба в собственном цехе на территории дома. У Софии работают 8 человек. Пельмени она фасует в пакеты, в среднем в день она продает около 100 кг., также ежедневно София продает 50 булок хлеба. София на заказ жарит бобы и фасует их в пакеты. Сыновья Софии развозят всю продукцию по торговых точкам. Ее супруг занимается сельским хозяйством - выращивает бычков, сажает морковь и картофель.  Благодаря упорному труду Софии и ее дружной и сплоченной семьи, бизнес приносит ежемесячную прибыль в размере 30,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, София обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку муки, мяса и лука у оптовых продавцов для производства пельменей. Доходы от кредита София планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Sofia is 44 and married with two sons. She has a specialist-high school education and since 2008 has been making pelmeni (meat dumplings) and bread in a workshop attached to her home as the primary source of income for her family. With the help of eight employees she packs the pelmeni and sells an average of 100 kg of them daily as well as 50 loaves of bread. She also takes orders for packaged cooked beans. Sofia's sons take the goods around to various retail locations and her husband works in agriculture, raising steers and growing carrots and potatoes.

Thanks to the hard work of Sofia and her loving and close-knit family, the business brings in about 30,000 KGS per month in profit. With the goal of further developing her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 KGS to purchase flour, meat and onions from wholesalers to use to make pelmeni. She plans to invest profits from the loan into further expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase flour, meat and onions for the production of meat dumplings

loans.name: Moyen Group

texts.fr:
Mr K. Paul est le représentant du groupe MOYEN. Il se porte très bien. Marié, il est père de 05 enfants, le plus âgé a 16 ans et le moins âgé a 09 ans. 04 vont à l’école. Il a 02 personnes en charge.
Monsieur est agriculteur depuis 30 ans. Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants. Ses clients sont les commerçants du marché de son quartier.
Il  veut s’acheter 3sacs d’engrais, 2boites de semence de choux et 2sachets de 250g d’insecticide.
Mr K. Paul veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour renforcer  son activité et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mr. K. Paul is the representative for Moyen Group. He is doing very well. He is married and a father of five: his oldest is sixteen, and his youngest nine years old. Four of the children go to school. He has two other dependents.

He has been a farmer for thirty years. He procures his supplies from local markets. His clients are the retailers in his area.

He wants to buy three bags of fertilizer, two boxes of cabbage seeds and two small bags of insecticide.

Mr. K. Paul want to use profits to bolster his business and improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy three bags of fertilizer, two boxes of cabbage seeds and two small bags of insecticide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new movies to add to his library and finish roofing his house.

loans.name: Les Fideles De Dilaire 1, 2 & 4 Group

texts.fr:
Paulimus est le coordinateur de son groupe Fideles de Dilaire1, 2 & 4. Il n'est pas marie. Il a 3 enfants. Il habite dans la région nord`est Haïti ou l’électricité est rare et de l’eau portable est très limite. Paulimus dirige son commerce de vente de produits cosmetique pendants les 8 derniers années. Il espère que ce emprunt l’aidera a grandir son commerce.

Des autres membres de Fideles de Dilaire 1, 2 & 4 ont besoin d’un emprunt pour les commerces ventes produits cosmétiques, charbon, chaussures, etc. Il dit que son défi principal est de devenir un plus grand commerçant Son but principal c’est d’avoir un plus grand commerce qui lui facilitera à construire une plus grande maison avec prêt de Esperanza Int.
texts.en:
Paulimus is the coordinator for his group, Fideles de Dilaire1, 2 & 4. He is unmarried. He has three children. He lives in the North-Eastern region of Haiti, where electricity is rare and drinkable water very limited.

Paulimus has managed his cosmetics resale business for the past eight years. He hopes that this loan will help him grow his business. Other members of Fideles de Dilaire 1, 2 & 4 need a loan for retail businesses in cosmetics, charcoal, shoes, etc.

He says that his main challenge is to become a larger retailer. His main goal is to own a bigger business, which will make it easier for him to build a larger house with the loans of Esperanza Int.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Victorie De Bordemer Group

texts.fr:
Jimy est le coordinateur de son groupe Victorie de Bordemer. Il n ’est  pas  marie et Il a 1 enfant. Jimy habite dans la region nord  d`Haïti ou de électricité est rare et de l'eau portable est très limité. Il dirige son commerce de vente de  panier  pendant  les 4 dernieres années. 
 
Jimy espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à grandir son commerce. l'achat de ce prêt matériaux pour fabriquer des paniers. Des autres membres de  Victorie de Bordemer ont besoin d’un  emprunt pour le commerce tel que ventes produits cosmétiques, poisson, boissons gazeuses,  charbon, divers produits, etc.

Il dit son but principal c'est d'avoir un plus grand commerce qui lui facilitera   a voyager dans les autres pays de l’amerique tel que, panamas, perou et mexique.
texts.en:
